amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for the Afghan Security Forces by $22 million and increases funding for suicide prevention outreach in the Defense Health Program by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Afghan Security Forces Fund by $22 million and to increase funding for the Defense Health Program by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boswell amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boswell amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Boswell.
